Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
17.02.2014 GB SCR18726 Added 19 Country
27.09.2013 JH SCR18431 Replaced hardcoded 'EU' by GSET_INFSCODE (226)
16.11.2012 SH SCR17694 Added BDC154.PO.REINSURANCE_GRADE, used for output as last column
05.01.2012 GB SCR16997 Added condition for write debtors to the CSV file
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
04.11.2010 SH SCR15948 Changed update of GM102.PI.AttachmentPath, blank now if
no file is created or it's empty
06.07.2010 SH SCR15639 Fixed bug v.BDC154.PO.REINS_LIMIT(G.Curr) was not reset
05.07.2010 GB SCR 15633 Added the PI.EMAILADDRESS
01.07.2010 AK SCR15627 if DEBC_CREDITLIMIT is null '0' on DEBC_CREDITLIMITH
04.02.2010 AK SCR15233 fixed bug on foreign Currencies

ExpSyntax.val: IF (FileExist (Trim ({0,10})) AND FileSize (Trim ({0,10}))>0,MlsTrans ('BPQ022 - File with selected debtors'),MlsTrans ('BPQ022 - No query available according to selection criterias'))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select distinct CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO from :1/clnt
where CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=:2 and :3 CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2

Text.val: ... has to be perforemd below v.BDC151.PO.DEBCNOCLIMIT because of re-computing
after BDC154 call
-- Reset variables
... calculate payment days
... prepare fields for output
if DEBC_CREDITLIMIT is null the we ignore '0' on DEBC_CREDITLIMITH
... prepare output line

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTINVDATE) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDUEDATE) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNT-DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDISPUTES-DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTPARTIALPAYM) as decimal(15,2)) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO = :2 and DCMO_YEAR = :3 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':4' for fetch only
